attributes.title: NEVER GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This is a horrible app and is trying to find my location. It told me to put my address and zip code in before I could continue; the next hour, there was a box at my door with poisonous Cheetos inside. I tried deleting the app but it wouldn’t let me and sent oranges, Cheetos with drawn on faces, spaghetti hair toupee’s, and much more. They will hunt you down and continue sending things til you agree to terms that you will vote for trump no matter what and that I would not have a problem with people in cages.😭😭😭 I would’ve maybe voted for him but now because of this app😬 I can’t.

attributes.title: yeah❤️
attributes.review: Hi!! I hope President Trump sees this!! He is so sexy and I wish he wasn’t married😪 anyways, I am a HUGEEEEEE republican and all of the hillary loving libtards hate me. I know that they are all atheists so they will rot in hell soon😸😸😸anyways, i just wanted to pop on here real quick and show my hate for this app. i support the president and all of his policies #4moreyears and he is the best president we have EVER had!!! second only to hitler😻🤪 i wish i could eliminate all of the filthy mexicans and democrats. also, i’m so sick of hearing people talk about black lives matter. it’s so selfish. ALL LIVES MATTER. just because I am white doesn’t mean that my life isn’t hard?? i have worked for EVERYTHING i have... well my husband has, but he told me I have a voluptuous butt and he only needed me for the sex and to have our kids. Ha ha! sounds like my president, gotta love it! this app is a flaming pile of poo🤣🤣🤣 i have never seen something so poorly made, and i should know! my husband tells me that my parents should have aborted me when they had the chance!!! it’s ok though, we are still Pro Life💋💋 he just jokes sometimes. HAHAHAHAHHAHHAJAAHHAHAHAHA LOSERS if you’ve made it this far i respect you and want you to know i CRINGED writing that. i am actually a PROUD democrat and i HATE TRUMP!! hopefully the big macs will catch up to him soon and his heart will stop❤️❤️. everyone rate this 1 star and say it with me “ANYONE BUT TRUMP 2020!” he is a horrible human and i can’t wait to set barron free lol😈☠️🤜🏻🥩💅🏻🧞‍♂️🥶💩👾
